description:
The crew takes a break at a resort hotel, at Akari`s suggestion.  That night Daichi sees Hana weeping in his room.  Meanwhile, the Planetary Gears are planning to drop the satellite Legacy on Earth.  The Midsummers Knights are helpless to stop it from crashing into Tanegashima base.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Maiden`s Tear That Sparkled Through the Night
Les larmes de la jeune fille qui illuminent la nuit
Yoru o Tsuranuku Shoujo no Namida
夜をつらぬく少女の涙
